img_summary: The image depicts the Shock-Quelling Powder, an uncommon consumable item in the game "Black Myth: Wukong." When used, it instantly removes the Chilled State and significantly reduces Chill Resistance for a short duration. This item can be crafted from the Shrine store under "Make Medicines" after helping Xu Dog defeat Lang-Li-Guhh-Baw in Sandgate Village - Village Entrance in Yellow Wind Ridge. The required ingredients for crafting include 1 Fire Bellflower and 1 Jade Lotus.
